[ApRow form_id="form_600660626937763" class="row" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_8725328915903695" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_16327382054103635" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_8650184326289235" accordion_type="full" content_html="

Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to suport@prestashop.com

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_22600920383206505" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_9475767967639226" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_4394344863394340" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_9003322327432271" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop?" content_html="

PrestaShop is a free shopping cart platform that helps small to large businesses build and run a successful online store.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_11221793241713324" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="How much does PrestaShop cost?" content_html="

PrestaShop is 100% free. No monthly fees. No commissions on your sales.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_2139555055889567" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="Why is PrestaShop free?" content_html="

We believe everyone should have the ability to start to sell online for free. By forming partnerships with industry leaders (such as Google, PayPal, eBay, etc.), we are able to share our powerful ecommerce software with the world, for free. These strategic partnerships empower our users with rich features and financially support the progress and growth of PrestaShop.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9387260416757548" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I’m already using another shopping cart, how can I switch to PrestaShop?" content_html="

No matter what ecommerce software you’re using, we’ve made it easy to migrate your store to PrestaShop. Find out how to switch to PrestaShop quickly and seamlessly without losing your store data.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5321547348868727" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What types of businesses use PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="

From goods and services to downloadable products, reservations and marketplaces, PrestaShop is designed to fit all types of businesses. You can get a taste of the stores we’re powering in our store showcase.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_1133673601422516" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="Where can I find a guide to help me with PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="

Find the help you need in the PrestaShop documentation.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_32931499755535575" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I have a question about my online store." sub_title="" content_html="

The PrestaShop forum is a great place to find answers and exchange advice. You can post a question or search previous posts to see if someone has already shared the answer.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_3165681017659102" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I need professional support." sub_title="" content_html="

We have experts waiting to help. Sign up for a technical support plan.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_8043417646834376" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I am looking for a web agency or freelancer to build my store." sub_title="" content_html="

We have teamed up with the most talented web agencies and freelancers in the industry. Check out our roster of PrestaShop Partner Web Agencies.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_6071310897484496" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I want to learn how to make the most out of PrestaShop." sub_title="" content_html="

We offer a variety of training courses to fit the needs of merchants at all levels. Our in-house experts instruct courses in person or online. Sign up for an upcoming session.

"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_3078390185177491" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop Download?" sub_title="" content_html="

PrestaShop Download gives you access to our open source code. You can build and self-host your shop and edit all of the files.

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]

[ApRow form_id="form_600660626937763" class="row" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_8725328915903695" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_16327382054103635" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_8650184326289235" accordion_type="full" content_html="

Below FAQ are some common concerns of our clients before purchasing the theme, if you have other questions, please just send it to suport@prestashop.com

"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][ApColumn form_id="form_22600920383206505" xl="4" lg="4" md="12" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][/ApColumn][/ApRow][ApRow form_id="form_9475767967639226" container="container" class="row box-faqpage" bg_config="boxed" bg_type="normal" bg_repeat="no-repeat" parallax_speed="0.1" parallax_axis="both" parallax_strength="0.5" parallax_rid="0.5" parallax_hoffsets="0.1" parallax_voffsets="0.1" specific_type="all" active="1" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApColumn form_id="form_4394344863394340" sm="12" xs="12" sp="12" md="12" lg="12" xl="12" specific_type="" controller_pages="" controller_id=""][ApHtml form_id="form_9003322327432271" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="accordion-open" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop?" content_html="
PrestaShop is a free shopping cart platform that helps small to large businesses build and run a successful online store.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_11221793241713324" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="How much does PrestaShop cost?" content_html="
PrestaShop is 100% free. No monthly fees. No commissions on your sales.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_2139555055889567" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="Why is PrestaShop free?" content_html="
We believe everyone should have the ability to start to sell online for free. By forming partnerships with industry leaders (such as Google, PayPal, eBay, etc.), we are able to share our powerful ecommerce software with the world, for free. These strategic partnerships empower our users with rich features and financially support the progress and growth of PrestaShop.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_9387260416757548" accordion_type="accordion" active="1" title="I’m already using another shopping cart, how can I switch to PrestaShop?" content_html="
No matter what ecommerce software you’re using, we’ve made it easy to migrate your store to PrestaShop. Find out how to switch to PrestaShop quickly and seamlessly without losing your store data.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_5321547348868727" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What types of businesses use PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="
From goods and services to downloadable products, reservations and marketplaces, PrestaShop is designed to fit all types of businesses. You can get a taste of the stores we’re powering in our store showcase.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_1133673601422516" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="Where can I find a guide to help me with PrestaShop?" sub_title="" content_html="
Find the help you need in the PrestaShop documentation.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_32931499755535575" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I have a question about my online store." sub_title="" content_html="
The PrestaShop forum is a great place to find answers and exchange advice. You can post a question or search previous posts to see if someone has already shared the answer.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_3165681017659102" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I need professional support." sub_title="" content_html="
We have experts waiting to help. Sign up for a technical support plan.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_8043417646834376" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I am looking for a web agency or freelancer to build my store." sub_title="" content_html="
We have teamed up with the most talented web agencies and freelancers in the industry. Check out our roster of PrestaShop Partner Web Agencies.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_6071310897484496" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="I want to learn how to make the most out of PrestaShop." sub_title="" content_html="
We offer a variety of training courses to fit the needs of merchants at all levels. Our in-house experts instruct courses in person or online. Sign up for an upcoming session.
"][/ApHtml][ApHtml form_id="form_3078390185177491" class="" accordion_type="accordion" override_folder="" active="1" title="What is PrestaShop Download?" sub_title="" content_html="
PrestaShop Download gives you access to our open source code. You can build and self-host your shop and edit all of the files.
"][/ApHtml][/ApColumn][/ApRow]
